sentences.en: And finally, a word about the winner and runner-up.
As a jockey he rode 10 winners.
sentences.cn: 作为骑师他曾十度驾驭获胜赛马。

sentences.en: By September, they will have whittled the list down to a winner.
sentences.cn: 9月之前他们会从名单中确定出最后的赢家。

sentences.en: Five lucky winners will each receive a signed copy of the album.
sentences.cn: 五位幸运的获胜者每人将得到一张签名专辑。

sentences.en: Gough scored the winner in extra time.
sentences.cn: 高夫在加时赛中攻入制胜球。

sentences.en: He snatched a last gasp winner.
sentences.cn: 他在最后关头一举夺冠。

sentences.en: He was adjudged the winner by 54 votes to 3.
sentences.cn: 他被裁定以54票对3票获胜。

sentences.en: Listeners have been invited to phone in to pick the winner.
sentences.cn: 听众被邀请打进电话选择赢家。

sentences.en: One wondered what heights of ecstasy the winner reached.
sentences.cn: 人们想知道胜者欣喜若狂到了什么程度。

sentences.en: the eventual winner of the tournament
The winner of each preliminary goes through to the final.
sentences.cn: 每场初赛的获胜者进入决赛。

sentences.en: The winner will be notified by post.
sentences.cn: 获胜者将以邮件形式通知。

sentences.en: The winner will face the Oakland A's in the playoffs this weekend.
sentences.cn: 获胜者将在本周末的季后赛中对阵奥克兰运动者队。

sentences.en: They think the appeal is a winner.
sentences.cn: 他们认为上诉能够成功。

phrases.phrase: be on (或 on to) a winner
phrases.tran_cn: 遵循可带来收益的做法（或计划）

trans.tran_en: a person or animal that has won something
